decks.notes: This deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It includes cards that pump up creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Emberheart Challenger, as well as removal spells like Reckless Rage. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional mana ramp. Overall, the strategy is to apply early pressure and maintain tempo in order to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize.

The main idea behind this deck is to control the board through the use of Enigmatic Incarnation, a powerful enchantment that allows you to sacrifice creatures to search for higher-costed creatures in your deck. By utilizing this enchantment alongside a variety of powerful Overlord creatures and other utility cards, the goal is to outvalue and outmaneuver your opponent to secure victory. With Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion, you have access to additional resources to help maintain control and grind out wins in a long game.

The main concept of this deck is to aggressively build up green mana devotion, utilizing cards like Nykthos, Shrine to Nyx and Leyline of the Guildpact to generate large amounts of mana. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful green creatures such as Old-Growth Troll and Cavalier of Thorns, while also utilizing cards like Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner and Storm the Festival to generate card advantage and maintain pressure. The deck also includes some powerful land cards like Boseiju, Who Endures and Sunken Citadel to provide additional utility and flexibility.

The deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with Arclight Phoenix while disrupting the opponent with disruptive spells like Lightning Axe and Spell Pierce. It also utilizes treasure tokens to help cast big spells like Treasure Cruise and Profit's Eidetic Memory. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and aggressive, constantly putting pressure on the opponent while also maintaining card advantage. Additionally, it includes some versatile removal spells and counter magic to control the opponent's board and protect your own threats.

This Rakdos Aggro deck focuses on quickly controlling the board and draining opponents' life totals through aggressive creature plays and targeted removal spells. Utilizing high-powered creatures like Archfiend of the Dross and Bloodtithe Harvester, along with efficient removal like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, the deck aims to pressure opponents early on and finish them off before they can stabilize. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the aggressive game plan, with some utility lands and spells providing additional reach and resilience against opposing strategies.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly assemble Lotus Field with cards like Expedition Map and Hidden Strings, then generate a large amount of mana with Lotus Field to cast powerful spells like Dig Through Time and Pore Over the Pages. The deck also utilizes card draw and filtering effects to find combo pieces and ensure consistency. Wish can be used to tutor for specific cards needed to win the game. Overall, the deck aims to efficiently combo off and overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and overwhelming mana advantage.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on using sacrifice synergies and efficient removal spells to control the board while dealing direct damage to the opponent. The deck includes the Cauldron Familiar and Witch's Oven combo to generate value and trigger effects like Mayhem Devil's ability. Claim the Firstborn and Deadly Dispute provide additional ways to steal opponent's creatures and sacrifice them for advantage. The deck also utilizes Ygra, Eater of All as a powerful finisher. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain control throughout the game.
